title: AstroNautilus Hook From Bush Bug
body: I have been meaning to post this thread for quite some time, and I don't know if someone has already put this out there, but when a Nautilus using the AstroNautilus skin is in a bush and he hooks, I can never see the animation of the hook until the hook has already hit me.  I will try to get this on video and edit this, but I just wanted to put that out there in case any Rito employees are watching.
